title: Looking to buy/trade for t206 Chief Meyers-more cards listed
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Looking to buy/trade for t206 Chief Meyers-more cards listed
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for t206 Chief Meyers portraits with the following backs top priority but may be interested in any(upgrade).

El Principe De Gales
Cycle 460
Sweet Cap 350-460 fact. 25, 42, and 42OS



Some trade bait includes: 
Chief Bender no trees Old Mill SGC 30
Joe Tinker Sweet Cap Portrait SGC 40
Larry Doyle Bat E92 Dockmans SGC 40
Hugh Jennings one hand Cycle 460 SGC 20
Vic Willis Batting American Beauty 350 no frame PSA 2

These cards can be viewed here.
[url]http://ImageEvent.com/mhgt/forsaletrade[/url]







If you have any you are willing to sell or trade let me know.
[URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]
Thanks
Mike
Listed some more cards for trade with a link to scans.
Added a couple of cards as trade bait.
